GameIsBlockedException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.exception.gameboard_exception
The class GameIsBlockedException is a subclass of Exception So it's a checked exceptions and it need to be declared in a method or constructor's throws clause if they can be thrown by the execution of the method or constructor and propagate outside the method or constructor boundary.
